channel.title: This Week in Tech (MP3)
channel.description:
Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join the top tech pundits in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech.
Records live every Sunday at 5:15pm Eastern / 2:15pm Pacific / 21:15 UTC.
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/
